=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
     TopHATTwaffle's Full auto self wokring turret
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
this turret was made because i was bored, it fully works
will target 1 person at a time, it has a off switch
on the back that is a laser, when its there the gun is
on. when its not the gun is off.
the gun will NOT target up and down. and you MUST WALK
INFRONT OF IT for it to target you.
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
if you use this i dont want credit for it, i just ask
that you dont take credit for it your self
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gkh9bfylLkI
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
